entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:15 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 6:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
